dict.acceptation: 协定，协议；同意，一致；合同书；（词之间性、数、人称方面与…）一致；

sent.orig: To reach an agreement or to come to an agreement on price or salary.
sent.trans: 就价格或薪金达成协议。

sent.orig: Agreement Covering Implementation of the Ceasefire (Arawa Agreement)
sent.trans: 执行停火协定（阿拉瓦协定）

sent.orig: I acknowledge that this Agreement is a legally binding contractual agreement.
sent.trans: 本人确认此为具有法律约束力的合约协议。

sent.orig: This agreement may be informal, but it is advisable to have a written agreement all parties.
sent.trans: 这协议可以是非式的，但建议做一份书面协议较佳。

sent.orig: We had the price agreement with the customer now. How about the sales agreement?
sent.trans: 我们现在与客户有价格协议了，那么销售协议呢？
